qa_pairs.q: How do we get into the flow?
qa_pairs.a: By letting go of our ego and self absorption

qa_pairs.q: What is the purpose of suffering?
How do we connect with the divine?

qa_pairs.a: Yes, but it is not yet here

where will I live in one year?

qa_pairs.a: No, we should be afraid of ourselves

qa_pairs.a: Yes, but there will also be good ones
